summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganGive BackMilani's Cheek Kiss Cream Bronzer gives sun-kissed glow year-round. A lightweight, ultra-blendable cream bronzer with a buildable soft matte finish that's never orange.
details: DetailsFeaturesLightweight, ultra-blendable & buildableNever orangey, soft matte finishInfused with Bulgarian Rose, Watermelon Seed & Pomegranate Seed OilMicro-sized spherical powders help blur skinBenefitsAvailable in mutilple shades designed to flatter every skin toneCruelty-freeMade in KoreaItem 2617876How To UseUsing fingers, brush or a sponge effortlessly build, blend & buff formula on to areas where the sun naturally hits including cheekbones, bridge of nose, temples & forehead.IngredientsDimethicone, Phenyl Trimethicone, Silica, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Isononyl Isononanoate, Mica, Calcium Sodium Borosilicate, Microcrystalline Wax / Cera Microcristallina / Cire microcristalline, Synthetic Wax, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Octyldodecanol, Sorbitan Olivate, Citrullus Lanatus (Watermelon) Seed Oil, Rosa Damascena Flower Oil, Tocopheryl Acetate, Punica Granatum Seed Oil, Stearalkonium Hectorite, Propylene Carbonate, Polyglyceryl-6 Polyricinoleate, Cetyl PEG/PPG-10/1 Dimethicone, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Sorbitan Isostearate, 1,2-Hexanediol, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Aluminum Hydroxide, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77492, CI 77491, CI 77499).
how_to_use: Using fingers, brush or a sponge effortlessly build, blend & buff formula on to areas where the sun naturally hits including cheekbones, bridge of nose, temples & forehead.
ingredients: Microcrystalline Wax / Cera Microcristallina / Cire microcristalline

reviews.headline: Great cream bronzer
reviews.comments: Glides smoothly, love the sades

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again.
reviews.comments: This bronzer is very good quality. It isn't splotchy on the skin. It applies smoothly and very affordable price!

reviews.headline: So blendable
reviews.comments: I honestly did not expect to love this cream bronzer as much as I did. Other bronzers I've used in the past have been hard to blend or are WAY too warm on my very pale skin. This one blended like a dream and is the perfect shade. It also lasts a long time.

reviews.headline: Shelby Ann made me buy it!
reviews.comments: I saw her viral makeup method, loved the milani colors, and wasn't disappointed! Creamy, buildable, and so easy to blend out! Ive got Hey Honey and Spilling Tea, both are beautiful! Big fan of Milani products!

reviews.headline: Pigmented and warm
reviews.comments: It is very pigmented go with the light hand and it's very warm almost orange

reviews.headline: best bronzer ever!!
reviews.comments: I LOVE this bronzer!! it's very subtle and natural, but buildable as well. I'm not usually a fan of cream products, but this one is definitely worth it! PLUS I don't get an orange cast, which is a very common occurrence as someone with super pale skin.

reviews.headline: The Perfect Cream Bronzer
reviews.comments: As someone with very fair skin, its diffult for me to find a bronzer that doesn't end up looking muddy or pulling orange on my skin. The shade "Hey Honey" is the perfect neutral cream bronzer for me. It has buildable coverage that works for both my minimal makeup and full glam days. It has a pretty good wear time, I've worn it for 8+ hours with miminal fading. It doesn't cling to dry spots and doesn't look patchy like other cream brozners I've used. Would definitely recommend this to anyone searching for an affordable cream bronzer

reviews.headline: Best cream bronzer on the market
reviews.comments: I adore this bronzer so much i just ran out and i will be repurchasing! I do think theh should expand the shades for sure.

reviews.headline: Pigmented and Blendable
reviews.comments: I love the shade, not orange and not gray. Perfect in between with great color payoff. Milani never disappoints for real. Best cream bronzer and the drugstore

reviews.headline: Easy cream product to use
reviews.comments: This is a really nice cream bronzer. It's very easy to blend out and is buildable. I like to tap my brush on the back of my hand before applying on my face to make it seem more natural and so it's easier to blend out. It gives a nice bronzey look and isn't orangey.

reviews.headline: Beautiful
reviews.comments: You can build it up or keep it natural. The finish is a bit glowy but still very natural and it is a dream to blend out. If you set it then it lasts, but by the end of a work day it doesnt stay on my face. (Im walking a lot throughout my shift). With primer or a base without setting it lasts with a bit of fading. Overall amazing product and this might be my holy grail cream bronzer.

reviews.headline: I really like
reviews.comments: Super blendable not patchy

reviews.headline: Absolutely love
reviews.comments: Great Bronzer

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments: I really love this creamy bronzer. it has a nice color pay off and easily blends with a brush or sponge. I use it for contouring and it stays most of the day, if i add a powder on top it doesnt budge. it doesnt look orangey on my cool skin tone and i love that it has clean ingredients.

reviews.headline: Amazing
reviews.comments: Absolutely amazing. I'm scared of using bronzer because I dont't want to look cakey, muddy, or unblended. This is perfect.

reviews.headline: You need
reviews.comments: This is fenomenal hands down best drugstore bronzer ! It looks beautiful

reviews.headline: Creamy and Great Application
reviews.comments: Love the texture and creaminess of this bronzer. Easy to apply and feels soft to the touch! I have fair skin and found the lightest shade to work well for me.

reviews.headline: Best cream bronzer i've ever tried
reviews.comments: Best cream/liquid bronzer i have EVER tried. I struggle with bronzer looking patchy but this blended like such a dream. Really easy to work with if you're a beginner. Like this so much more than some of the highend cream bronzers ive tried.

reviews.headline: Contour on a budget
reviews.comments: I love this creamy formula for contouring. Its easy to blend and a little goes a long way. Spicy season is the perfect contour color for me - I'm pretty fair so I just go in light handed. It is very similar to the MBM Skin perfector, just a little thicker and less oily.

reviews.headline: Creamy Bronzer
reviews.comments: The formula is so creamy and blends effortlessly into the skin, giving a natural and seamless finish. It's lightweight, so it doesn't feel heavy or cakey, and I appreciate how buildable it isâ€”you can go for a subtle glow or a more defined look. This bronzer has quickly become a staple in my makeup routine!"

media.headline: Creamy and blendable
media.caption: How bronzed I was after using this productðŸŒž

faceoff_positive.comments: Loveee this product! Bronzer is one of my favourite makeup products and this is a great one - it's super creamy, warm and easily blendable
faceoff_positive.headline: Creamy and blendable

faceoff_negative.comments: At first i loved this product and i so wish it worked for me. The color is beautiful, it blends well, and looks hydrating HOWEVER.. I did not expect to go back in time to my skin 15 years ago when I had acne GALORE. The powder blush and bronzer dont do this to me. If you have sensitive skin i wouldnt recommend it. I get an occasional pimple here and there but my entire face could be used as the before picture for an acutane commercial. Goodbye. Theowing away. Still love u milani, just not this. :(
faceoff_negative.headline: Not for sensitive acne prone skin
